pt: {it}Me{/it} is used in many constructions where strict grammarians prescribe {it}I.{/it} This usage is not so much ungrammatical as indicative of the shrinking range of the nominative form: {it}me{/it} began to replace {it}I{/it} sometime around the 16th century largely because of the pressure of word order. {it}I{/it} is now chiefly used as the subject of an immediately following verb. {it}Me{/it} occurs in every other position: absolutely
, and after prepositions, conjunctions, and verbs, including {it}be{/it}.

Almost all usage books recognize the legitimacy of {it}me{/it} in these positions, especially in speech; some recommend {it}I{/it} in formal and especially written contexts after {it}be{/it} and after {it}as{/it} and {it}than{/it} when the first term of the comparison is the subject of a verb.

et: Middle English, from Old English {it}mē{/it}; akin to Old High German {it}mīh{/it} me, Latin {it}me{/it}, Greek {it}me{/it}, Sanskrit {it}mā{/it}

dt: {bc}marked by similarity to or by adoption of successful or persuasive policies or practices used or promoted by another person or entity

dt.t: … a growing trend of {wi}me-too{/wi} tax schemes.
The bill is a {wi}me-too{/wi} version of what already exists on the federal level …
Faced with the tedium of {wi}me-too{/wi} panel discussions, candidates have created their own exhibition season.

dt: {bc}similar or identical to an established product (such as a drug) with no significant advantage over it

dt.t: … a legion of {wi}me-too{/wi} wines with similar price tags …
At a recent meeting she argued against trying to undercut truck competitors with cheaper {wi}me-too{/wi} engines.

The great majority of "new" drugs are not new at all but merely variations of older drugs already on the market. These are called "{wi}me-too{/wi}" drugs. The idea is to grab a share of an established, lucrative market by producing something very similar to a top-selling drug.

shortdef: marked by similarity to or by adoption of successful or persuasive policies or practices used or promoted by another person or entity
similar or identical to an established product (such as a drug) with no significant advantage over it

dt: {bc}a movement calling attention to the frequency with which primarily women and girls experience sexual assault and harassment

dt.t: In many ways, the original purpose of {wi}Me Too{/wi} was achieved. It sent a message to survivors of sexual assault and harassment: you're not alone, these experiences are not anomalies, cases of individual bad luck, or the result of some misbehaviour or mistake on your part.
Because of {wi}#MeToo{/wi}, more people are talking about sexual assault and wondering how they can address it in their workplace beyond just a policy on the books, [Gina] Scaramella said.
The {wi}#MeToo{/wi} movement put a powerful spotlight on the sexual abuse and harassment women have been suffering under for ages …

Paige Meltzer, the director of the Women's Center at Wake Forest University, said the {ldquo}{wi}Me Too{/wi}{rdquo} campaign has united men and women in the uphill battle against sexual assault and changing societal mentalities.
Three years later, [Louisette] Geiss and producer Howard Kagan are shepherding to the stage a new musical based on Geiss's story and the accounts of two dozen other {wi}MeToo{/wi} survivors.
Tarana Burke founded {wi}MeToo{/wi} more than a decade ago, in response to sexual violence that was endemic in her community.

dt: The styling {it}#MeToo{/it} is used in text to refer to the movement and in social media as a {d_link|hashtag|hashtag}.

shortdef: a movement calling attention to the frequency with which primarily women and girls experience sexual assault and harassment
with me as judge : in my opinion

dt: {bc}any of a genus ({it}Myosotis{/it}) of small herbs of the borage family having usually bright blue or white flowers usually arranged in a curving spike

shortdef: any of a genus (Myosotis) of small herbs of the borage family having usually bright blue or white flowers usually arranged in a curving spike

dt: {bc}put in use by one person or group after being used, discarded, or handed down by another

shortdef: put in use by one person or group after being used, discarded, or handed down by another
ready-made and usually cheap and shoddy

dt: {bc}a woman's short usually knitted sleeveless close-fitting jacket

shortdef: a woman's short usually knitted sleeveless close-fitting jacket

et: Latin, do not touch me; from Jesus' words to Mary Magdalene (John 20:17)
shortdef: a warning against touching or interference
